title: Missing Honor Ward
body: i don't know if this is a bug or something, but all my friends got their honor wards already, but when i go to change my ward skin there is no honor ward there. Was i just glossed over? Is there more requirements i didn't realise?

replies.body: It's likely they just got their ward skin before you got yours. Rewards will still be going out over the course of the month, but if you still don't see yours in a week or so hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MH5rajP1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-13T03:07:25.167+0000)
>
> It's likely they just got their ward skin before you got yours. Rewards will still be going out over the course of the month, but if you still don't see yours in a week or so hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Thanks, been seeing a lot of posts around the internet about not getting wards (don't have mine yet) but this is the first confirmation I've seen that they're still coming out. I know it's the usual end-of-season routine, but thanks for the peace of mind.

Of course fam ^_^!

We do have this info posted in the [**Ranked Rewards Help Desk**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk), but I understand the info can be a little spread out sometimes.
